meanings.definition: A small, fast Spanish or Portuguese sailing ship of the 15th-17th centuries.
meanings.sent1: The caravel sailed swiftly across the ocean.
meanings.sent2: The explorers used a caravel to navigate the seas.
meanings.sent3: The caravel and its crew raced against time to reach new lands.
meanings.sent4: The caravel cut through the waves like a knife through butter.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the caravel on the horizon filled the sailors with hope.
